ygData.subject: re: an Idea
ygData.msgSnippet: I have seen the lamp you are talking about. Never found out what it was triggering. It was mentioned a few months ago on this list when we were still looking
ygData.messageBody:
I have seen the lamp you are talking about. Never found out what it was triggering. It was
mentioned a few months ago on this list when we were still looking desperately for the 3rd
book/fishing pole recipe. I don't remember anyone coming up with an answer about it.

Arkham, gnome necromancer (Bertoxxulous)


> ** Original Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] an Idea
> ** Original Sender: Yigman008@...
> ** Original Date: Thu, 6 Jan 2000 22:26:36 EST

> ** Original Message follows...

>
> I was readin a post, I discounted it as major B.S. but checked it out
> regardless since I was in Ak'anon. It mentioned somethin bout a clockwork
> dragon, now the dragon, I don't believe, not by a longhshot. But it also
> mentioned one of those lamp, star light post things, and when ya click it, it
> makes a door opening sound and turns 90 degrees. I thought that it was worth
> 2 seconds investigation, so I found the one that wasn't soinning next to the
> lake. I clicked it, and sure enough, it turned bout 90 degrees, and I heard
> the door creak. I have no idea what this is about, knowing my luck, this
> little topic has popped up on the list before, but I'm a recent addition to
> it. If it has, GOOD! someone please fill me in and quench my curiosity. If it
> hasn't, anyone have any ideas what it is, cause who knows, what if it has
> valid importance, this is a long shot, but it may have somethin to with
> diamond dust. I know I know, there's a bunch of you thinking I'm prime full
> of it, but about the little door creak and star lamp thing, I'm not, I invite
> you to see it yourself. Anyways, I jus thought I'd toss that one out there.
> If it's been brought up before, forgive me for my insolence.
>
> Yigoron,
> 30 Magician,
> Bristlebane
>
